name: Lesson Plan Book
author: Suborna Fermi, Ronnie Burt, and Kieran O'Shea

sections.description: Ideal for teachers, professors, and instructors of all types of courses! Share your detailed lesson plans with others on your WordPress site or blog. Based off of the popular calendar plugin, our lesson plan book allows you to plan for multiple classes, courses, or subjects. List relevant links and attach files for users to download. Parents and students love this plugin to keep up with the daily activities in a class – especially useful for absent students!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the lesson-plan-book folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory (or use the upload function in the WordPress dashboard!)
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You must create a new page and place {LESSON} in the text of the page where you want the calendar to appear.
sections.faq:
Where can I get support for the Lesson Plan Book? You can visit our site and use the “Contact Us” form for any questions. We also offer priority support to members of our EdNook.com site using our forums.

Where can I learn more? Visit http://ednook.com/2009/12/30/lesson-plan-book/ for screen shots, a demo, and more information.
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • Changed {CALENDAR} key to {LESSON} to minimize plugin conflicts.

1.2

  • Improved color choices in backend.

1.1

*Fixed grammar and typo erros

1.0

*First release
